= camel infra log

Displays external service logs


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel infra log [options]
----



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--json` | Output in JSON Format |  | boolean
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
